Explore Cape Town your way with a visit to The Old Biscuit Mill—a vibrant artisan and culinary market, or the District Six Museum—a memorial dedicated to the 60,000 inhabitants forced to relocate after Apartheid destroyed the area. After visiting the UNESCO World Heritage site and former prison of Nelson Mandela on Robben Island, meet ex-prison guard Christo Brand for lunch at the Amy Foundation to hear fascinating stories about one of history’s most inspirational figures. At Boschendal Wine Estate, enjoy a Farm-to-Table lunch of locally sourced foods, harvested from the Werf Food Garden and cooked to perfection by Chef Allistaire Lawrence. In Kruger National Park, adventure out on a private open-air safari in search of the Big Five. Led by professional trackers, this once in a lifetime experience unfolds the largest game reserve in South Africa. Considered to be the largest in the world, Victoria Falls truly stuns the senses as your Local Expert leads a guided walk alongside the roaring waters, refreshing mists and plummeting ravines of this awe-inspiring, worldly wonder. Day 2 - Cape Peninsula and Lunch in Kalk Bay At Cape Point Nature Reserve, explore one of the world's most pristine wildernesses. Rare wildlife sightings continue at Boulders Beach as you learn about the resident colony of African penguins before lunch overlooking Kalk Bay. Day 3 - Majestic Table Mountain Relaxed Start Join a Local Expert at The Old Biscuit Mill to sample culinary delights. Or, visit the District Six Museum’s memorial dedicated to the area destroyed during Apartheid. End the day in decadent style, enjoying drinks and views over Cape Town atop Table Mountain. Day 4 - Historic Cape Winelands Relaxed Start At Vergelegen Estate, indulge in a wine tasting. At Boschendal Wine Estate savour a seasonal Farm-to-Table lunch before returning to Cape Town in a chauffeured vintage car. Day 5 - Amy Foundation and Robben Island Hear stories from a Local Historian and meet a former-political prisoner at UNESCO World Heritage Site, Robben Island. At the Victor Verster prison where Nelson Mandela spent the last months of his imprisonment, join a former guard for an onsite lunch at the non-profit Amy Foundation, a MAKE TRAVEL MATTER® Experience. Day 6 - Luxury Safari Experience Savour your first moments in Big Five territory, Kruger National Park. The Lion Sands Lodge welcomes you with luxury suites. End the day with an evening game drive and sundowners before a feast in your suite. Day 7 - Looking for the Big Five With the help of your expert guide, spot leopards, crocodiles, hippos and elephants on your morning game drive. Relax over high tea or join your ranger for a bush walk. Enjoy your second drive searching for rhino, buffalo and lions as the sun sets beyond the savannah. Day 8 - We're Going on a Safari Greet the dawn for a game drive keeping an eye out for buck and towering giraffes. Savour breakfast at your villa before a leisurely birding walk. After your final evening game drive, raise a toast to adventure as you dine beneath a blanket of stars. Day 9 - Onto Johannesburg Appreciate the skill and in-depth knowledge of your ranger and tracker on your final morning game-drive. After breakfast, your included flight takes you to Johannesburg. On arrival, transfer to your stunning inner-city hotel. Day 10 - Farewell South Africa and onto Victoria Falls Bid farewell to the City of Gold, as you transfer to the airport for your included flight to Victoria Falls. Meet your Local Host and you are driven to your five-star hotel, surrounded by the tranquil Victoria Falls Private Game Reserve. In the evening, a hearty African feast of game and vegetable pots is served at the legendary Boma Restaurant. Day 11 - Majestic Victoria Falls Get up close to the awe-inspiring Victoria Falls on a guided walk alongside a Local Expert. Embark on an iconic sunset cruise on the renowned Zambezi River, once navigated by British explorer David Livingstone. In the evening, gather in the Livingstone Room at your hotel for a magical dinner. Day 12 - Farewell Victoria Falls Enjoy a hearty breakfast and leisurely morning, before transferring to the airport where your journey comes to an end.
